name: Chaos on Wheels (itch)
description:
💥 Chaos on Wheels is the ultimate arena car combat game 💥

A real modern chaotic vehicular combat experience.
Fast-paced action with modern cars 🚘, filled with tons of bullets 🎯, rockets 🚀, and missiles in a semi-destructible environment.

Choose your driver 🚴‍♀️ and take a wheel of a heavily armored car. Drive yourself to victory by destroying 💀 any enemy that stands in your way. Avoid projectiles, traps, and hazards and bring chaos to anyone who opposes you.

Customize your cars 🛠, equip armor 🛡, buy weapons 🔫, unlock new gadgets ⚙, upgrade ammo and fight other players in a battle of total mayhem 💣.

Complete achievements, upgrade cars and make even more chaos 💥💥💥
